title: Pokemon doodles thread
body:
#Edit: Done with requests, not taking anymore

I need more art practice and it can actually be somewhat difficult for me to pick some mons to draw.

I'm likely just going to do sketches but I might polish them later.

Also try to check [my other thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Xu56MAkG-dump-of-most-pokemon-drawings-ive-recently-drawn) first because I don't really want to do repeats.

I might not do every single request, especially ones of more complex pokemon
